name: EleMental (SlickRightClick)
description:
EleMental is a 2-player, competetive, local splitscreen, third person, battle arena game in which you and a friend can engage in combat.

Choose out of 4 different elemental classes; Water, Earth, Fire, and Air, each with their own unique abilities designed for that specific class.

Fight in an arena with destructible environements and an environmental hazard to see who is the most skilled at elemental combat. 

You will need gamepads/controllers to play this game.
